participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective. Enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: I live in my parents basement. I am a vegetarian. I like cats. I work in a flower shop. I read a lot of used books.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and outgoing. Loves to stay active and socialize.
participant_2.background: I rent an apartment. I work in finance. I live walking distance from work. I enjoy playing soccer.
